Definition: version of this schema
comments: Can be removed when integrated into DataCite. For versioning this schema until then.

Definition: Name of the maturity check
examples: ABC Maturity Metric, Super FAIRness Check

Definition: Description of the maturity check.
comments: see DataCite Metadata Schema Property 17 Description
examples: The ABC Maturity Check consists of 11 metrics, which test…

Definition: Type of the resource
comments: see DataCite Metadata Schema Property 10 ResourceType

Definition: The general type of the resource
is the metric machine-readable / can it be automatically evaluated
PID of the metric definition
comments: If the check consists of several metrics, which each an own definition,  URIs to individual metric definitions can be provided via 99.9.d

Definition: Name of the maturity check identifier schema
comments: see DataCite Metadata Schema Subproperty 12.a relatedIdentifierType

Definition: URI of the maturity check identfier schema
version of the maturity check
comments: Commonly, more than one person/organization is involved -- but, at least one. Question: How to link data to publications when both were reviewer by the same process?

Definition: information on who performed the maturity check
comments: similarities to DataCite Metadata Schema Property 2 Creator

Definition: function of person/organization in the context of this dataset
allowed values, other constraints: CV: [creator, publisher, data provider, external reviewer, contributor]

Definition: name of person/organization
examples: Josiah Carberry, Global Data Repository on Psychoceramics Research

Definition: PID of person/organization
Name of the person/organization identifier schema
URI of the person/organization identfier schema
provide result report for the check
summary of the result
examples: This dataset performed outstanding with respect to the ABC Maturity Evaluation ... .

Definition: PID or URI of a evaluation report or a similar document
Name of the report identifier schema
URI of the report identfier schema
date when the result was produced

comments: One maturity check might consist of several metrics (e.g. one metric for each aspect of FAIRness)

Definition: name of the metric
comments: name of the metric within the metric schema
examples: Check for persistent identifier, Maturity Check for Consistency

Definition: Description of the metric and the result unit
internal identifier of the metric
comments: ID of the metric within the metric schema

Definition: PID or URI of the metric definition
comments: If each metric of the particular check has an individual definition, this can be provided here.

Definition: Name of the metric definition identifier schema
comments: see DataCite Metadata Schema Subproperty 12.a relatedIdentifierType

Definition: URI of the metric definition identfier schema
results of the metric
comments: for storing evaluation result in DataCite metadata

Definition: unit of the result
comments: unit of the value provided in … MetricResult
examples: %, level of 5 (if ...MetricResult was 4, we would get level 4 of 5), points, 1 (dimensionless), levels A to E with A best and E worst
